Title: Relates to the rebuttable presumption relating to identifying information on an unsolicited advertisement in N.Y. city
Summary: Relates to the rebuttable presumption relating to identifying information on an unsolicited advertisement in cities with a population of one million or more; provides that such presumption shall apply if the advertising materials are placed at any one premise.
LawCode: Amd ยง397-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the rebuttable presumption relating to identifying information on an unsolicited advertisement in cities with a population of one million or more
